description: * The Mileage Tracker application can help you in tracking the miles you drive for various activities like business, charities or any other personal reasons.     * Option of tracking the miles for multiple businesses, medical or other.     * Customize the vehicles, businesses etc.     * The easiest way to track all your trips.     * This application is highly recommended for the ones who go for frequent trips.     * Track the miles for multiple businesses, medical or other.     * Customize the vehicles & other columns by adding or deleting in Preset.     * Automatic calculation of the miles travelled in the vehicle using the odometer readings.     * Modify, add or delete all the preset values.     * Option of emailing the trips.
